CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 26, 1958, pg. 1, reads: "'Climbin' Jacob's Ladder' - Acclaimed by Tears - Paul Robeson, distinguished baritone, actor, scholar and gentleman, loses himself in song, during his concert of folk and art songs of all nations, with brotherhood as a theme, at Central Baptist Church, Monday night. His inspirational singing brought tears to the eyes of more than one person in crowd of more than 1,800 who jammed the church and heard him declare: 'I will continue to fight to prove that ALL men are BROTHERS.' - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Paul Robeson performing in concert in Central Baptist Church, with seated choir in background
